entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore's portrait is described as 'deserted' and hanging behind the headmaster's chair. This suggests that Dumbledore is no longer present in the castle.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape's memories are mentioned as being poured into the Pensieve, indicating that Snape is no longer physically present but his memories remain.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as glancing at Dumbledore's portrait and then turning his back on it. This suggests that Harry is a key character in the story and is interacting with the castle and its inhabitants.

relationships.description: Harry glances at Dumbledore's deserted frame, indicating that Harry has viewed or looked at Dumbledore's portrait.
Snape's memories are poured into the Pensieve for Harry to view, indicating that Snape has left his memories with Harry.
